description: SpheroScan: A user-friendly deep learning tool for analyzing spheroid images. It streamlines spheroid segmentation, area calculation, and downstream analysis, aiding researchers in processing large datasets. The prediction module uses DL models to mask spheroid images and generate CSV files with area and intensity data. The visualization module offers plots and statistical analysis, ready for publication. SpheroScan accelerates and standardizes spheroid assay result analysis.
name: SpheroScan
